onyomiExamples.meaning: external pressure, outside pressure, foreign pressure
public relations, client liaison, client relations

far out wide (horse racing), far outside
other (place, thing, person), the rest, outside, beyond, nothing except, nothing but, nothing apart from, nothing aside from, no choice (but to), besides..., in addition to...
foreigner (esp. one of European ancestry), gaijin, outsider
